text: Ana zavi'ma ateazanku, Hazaeli'a antahigeno, Kva vahenimoka na'a agafare zavira netane, huno higeno Elisa'a kenona'a huno, Zavi'ma toana na'ankure henka'a kagra Israeli vahera tusi hazenke nezaminka, kuma kegina'zamia anafenafu hunka teve negrenka, nehazaveramina kazinteti zamahe nefrinka, ne'onse mofavreramina zamazerinka mopafi ruhapatinka nezamahenka, zamu'enema hu'nenaza a'nea kazinteti zamarimpa retragufegahane.
